overview: Documentary - Beyond The Light Switch thoughtfully considers the trade-offs of carbon capture and storage, hydraulic fracturing for natural gas, a nuclear renaissance, the costs of solar power, the sprawl of wind power and the feasibility of a super grid. This eye-opening documentary lays out the energy facts and conundrums facing America and guides viewers through many of the political, social, technological and environmental issues surrounding electrical power infrastructure.
title: Beyond the Light Switch
